CPU

RISC-V board is like a raspberry pi

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: @grewalsatinder  Those things look really interesting, saw a video about them, they also have open source FPGA's and custom chips you can build on  website and then order ... While they are not as fast as x86 based cores right now, the ability to easily offload complex instructions to FPGA's and create your own instructions pretty easily will mean that once people start using them and open sourceing the code things will take off very fast. Really one of the greatest things that has happened in a long while to Open Source space.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: Exactly mate üôÇ

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: @FishyGuts  does the new WP plugin allow vendors accept other ecosystem coins, maybe VRSC or OOT or ARRR?

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: The reason I ask is that KMD is already available with CoinPayments, which holds something like 1000 different coins and tokens and is available for woo commerce, magneto, and a few other e payment platforms

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: Just trying to figure out what a good unique selling point would be for the new plugin

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
The plugin was developed solely for KMD by the dev who is going to do the Pirate plugin.
Does coinpayments have any fees or additional requirements for clients/users?
This is a plugin that anyone can install in any wordpress site to accept KMD.  It's already been approved by wordpress and can be used anytime.
@Daniel CP

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: He could make other asset chain plugins fairly easy at this point I am certain and would be glad to get him to help any ecosystem devs who might want something like this.

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: The largest hurdle was linking wallets as Agama doesn't have a native option to create a master private key for the plugin to reference.
